system.description:
Trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.

Effect: The user may freely move up to one-and-a-half times of a Movement Score of their choice when declaring this attack.

Requirement: [Pikachu] Z-Power-Crystal as an Accessory Item and Volt Tackle on the user's Active List.

actions.name: Catastropika

cost.trigger: User's partner uses Z-Pose! and triggers the appropriate Z-Power-Crystal.
